p: Changes to current Dsol severity ( Fig 5Jâ€“5L) were comparable to those for Pbr under all emissions scenarios, although slightly lower. This is due to the similarity of their temperature-response curves ( Fig 4D). Geographic variability in the response of Dsol to climate change was also comparable to Pbr, with a mean difference in median monthly changes to current Dsol severity among the constituent countries of GB of 1.6, 3.0, and 4.1% for the low CO 2 2040s, medium CO 2 2060s, and high CO 2 2080s scenarios, respectively.
